backend/main.mo: Large Motoko canister implementing storage, access control, user profiles, ponds, posts, ribbits, tags, likes, and activity tracking with many ordered maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a UI requirement to impacted files and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of high-level summaries for numerous frontend React/TSX files and pages.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting up root container and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes, wraps app in ThemeProvider, and renders RouterProvider with toaster notifications.

frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution including a heart icon and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search, avatar, create menu, mobile drawer trigger, and search term recording.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapping header, footer, and routed content while managing mobile sidebar drawer state.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar showing links and recent activity with route-aware highlighting and activity previews.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, image, and actions like like, share, and bookmark.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders images with automatic aspect-ratio handling and blurred backdrops for non‑4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with body scroll locking and animated open/close.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for pond pages showing banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, related lily link, and comment preview.
Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit with avatar, timestamp, content, likes, and nested replies, including reply and like actions via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Renders an avatar image with a tiny blurred placeholder and smooth transition once the full image loads.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using fetched data with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions and allowing query submission.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown under search input showing trending terms or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags using shared tag list module components and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled tab list and trigger components with underline-focused appearance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Provides bookmark state synced to localStorage with helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear lily IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and status tracking using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query currently matches the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for interacting with backend actors to fetch and mutate ponds, profiles, posts, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode tokens, and utility classes for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into compact units like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image validation, resizing, and compression with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to lowercase alphanumeric and provides error messaging.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API with clipboard fallback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Handles username, user ID, and Froggy Phrase storage in localStorage, including hashing, obfuscation, and settings backup/restore.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-post cooldown tracking in localStorage to limit view count increments within a 5‑minute window.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing Ribbit, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with join status, loading states, and navigation to pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides UI and logic for creating new lilies, including content types, tags, image handling, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: UI for creating a new pond with validation and optional banner/profile image uploads with compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty or placeholder file for a create-post page.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with avatar, post and comment counts, and tabs for posts and comments, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with sorting, search handling, sidebars, and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders a single lily with likes, views, ribbits, posting replies, image viewing, and view-count increment logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays pond details including metadata, moderators, membership status, and a leave button with loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s feed with join logic, sorting by newest, sidebars, and loading or not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists bookmarked lilies stored locally, showing each item or a message when none exist, with removal support.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and sidebars, using TagItem and TagList components. Fetches tag stats and renders ranked tag lists with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows posts under a specific tag with sorting options and redirects to the canonical tag if needed. Fetches tag data, displays lily cards, and includes sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for username changes, avatar uploads, froggy phrase management, pond membership, and admin tag tools. Integrates multiple queries, mutations, and UI controls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, color tokens, animations, and plugins, defining extended colors, radii, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, existing features, and new feature requests related to removing horizontal inset on LilyCard hover background for desktop.
